title.9: The Last of Us Ellie Cosplaying Duck

desc.1: Stay warm in any weather with this cozy hoodie, featuring The Last of Us Part I logo across the back under the hood, and an embroidered Firefly icon on the left chest!
desc.2: A Firefly keychain. Show them your willing to live.
desc.3: Desk compass in a hinged wooden gift box. Card compass has directional Fleurs De Lis seeking north.
desc.4: Set of four die struck lapel pins in a gift box. Three pins at 1.25 and one pin at 2. Antiqued gold or silver plating. Standard post with butterfly clutch.
desc.5: Join Nathan Drake and Chloe Frazer across the globe as they confront warmongers and mercenaries, unite with former colleagues, uncover forgotten histories and tackle their deepest fears to forge their legacy.
desc.6: Naughty Dog and Dark Horse are proud to present the all-new Armored Clicker PVC Figure as the newest addition to the current lineup of The Last of Us Part II figures. Bringing to life the terrifying, Cordyceps-infected creatures, this deluxe collectible features an armored Clicker, twitching in anticipation to attack.
desc.7: The single-player story follows Joel, who is tasked with escorting the young Ellie across a post-apocalyptic United States and defend against cannibalistic creatures infected by a mutated strain of the Cordyceps fungus.
desc.8: The game focuses on two playable characters in a post-apocalyptic United States whose lives intertwine: Ellie, who sets out in revenge for a murder, and Abby, a soldier who becomes involved in a conflict between her militia and a religious cult.
desc.9: Cute duck Ellie! Let her protect you while bathing!
desc.10: There’s more to this black ceramic mug than meets the eye.  Once you have poured in a hot drink, all will be revealed.  Slowly, tributes to The Last of Us will appear – the Fireflies logo and iconic line ‘when you’re lost in the darkness, look for the light’ appears in a white typeface.
desc.12: The perfect bundle for The Last of Us fans, collectors, and cosplayers alike!
desc.13: Carry a piece of gaming history wherever you go with this adorable plush keychain, faithfully recreating the purple monster plush from Ellie's backpack.
